DATED : 30.09.2013

AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.§9/2013

Subject: Vehicle facility at airporots in respect of Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member
of Parliament Lok Sabha

Shri Shatrughan Sinha, Member of Parliament, Lok Sabha, shall be provided
the facility of airport-vehicle that can ferry him from airport terminal to the aircraft
and vice-versa at all those airporis where such a facility exists, for the period of three
months i.e. upto 13.12.2013.

This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA)

¥

(RN Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)

Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf.

Shri U K Bhatia, U/Secretary, MCA, Rajiv Gandhi Bhawan, New Delhi — for information wrt
MCA letter dated 16.09.2013.
